1.caption_en: Platforms often exhibit a winner-takes-all dynamic: network effects make a platform more valuable as more consumers, producers, and partners join, enabling one ecosystem to grow faster, lower costs, and ultimately dominate the market.
1.caption_ru: Platforms often exhibit a winner-takes-all dynamic: network effects make a platform more valuable as more consumers, producers, and partners join, enabling one ecosystem to grow faster, lower costs, and ultimately dominate the market.
